detail_desc: Set with a shirt and pair of trousers in a cotton weave and accessories. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Trousers with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake back pocket. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener. Detachable, adjustable braces with imitation leather details.
Waist bag with a zip at the front and an adjustable waist strap with a plastic buckle. Size 7x16x30 cm.
Sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with twisted side seams and short raglan sleeves.
Short-sleeved V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave. Pleats at the front, a box pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose weave with elastication at the back of the waist and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Soft, non-wired lace bras in cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide light support. No fasteners.
Push-up bras in cotton jersey with lace details and underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round, elasticated neckline, short raglan sleeves, decorative buttons at the top and an elasticated seam under the bust. Unlined.

Set with a zip-through hoodie and pair of trousers in soft, velour. Hoodie with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, frill-trimmed front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a faux fur pompom on top and sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
V-neck jumper in a double knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders and a straight hem with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Trousers in a softly draping viscose weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, side pockets, detachable tie belt and tapered legs.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen. Print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Straight-style shirt in linen with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey with a text print on the front. Opening with press-studs at one side and press-studs at the crotch.
Dress in patterned organic cotton jersey with short, frilled sleeves, a seam at the waist and gathered skirt.
Gently tailored jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a button at the front, welt front pockets with a flap, and a single back vent. Lined.

Knee-length shorts in twill made from a linen and cotton blend with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a fitted silhouette.
Crop tops in soft cotton jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and narrow elastication at the hem.
Long, round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey with a curved hem.
Metal rings. One smooth ring and eight in various designs.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a cotton weave with an embroidered pattern, round neckline with elastication front and back, and short puff sleeves.
Ankle-length suit trousers in sturdy jersey with a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly and tapered legs with decorative seams.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck tops in organic cotton jersey.

Jacket in soft, fast-drying thermal fleece with a high collar, concealed zip down the front and zipped chest pocket. Long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Tailored trousers in a sturdy textured weave with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Large clip earrings with flat metal discs. Length 12.5 cm.
Hairband in patterned jersey with a decorative knot detail at the front.
Microfibre and lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.

Short coat in soft faux shearling with large notch lapels with a buttonhole, concealed press-studs down the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders and wide, straight sleeves. Recycled polyester lining.
Long-sleeved jumper in rib-knit cotton with a longer jersey layer at the hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned, organic cotton jersey with a collar and chest pocket . Press-studs down the front and along one leg, short sleeves and short legs.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Tube scarf in a soft rib knit. Width 50 cm, circumference 65 cm.
Ankle-length kaftan in a sturdy jacquard weave with wide stripes in shimmering metallic thread. V-neck, short sleeves with a wide flounce, and slits in the sides.
Top in jersey made from a cotton blend containing glittery threads with a round neck and long sleeves with a gathered seam and flounce at the cuffs.
High-waisted trousers in washed stretch twill with back pockets and patch pockets with a decorative zip, a zip fly with a button and skinny legs.
Sports joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, taped details and side pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees for extra mobility and wide ribbed hems.
Short swim top in fast-drying functional fabric with long, printed raglan sleeves and an elasticated hem. Lined front and back.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit with a turtle neck, buttons on one shoulder and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.

Pyjamas with a top and pair of shorts in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. Top with a lace-covered V-neck and short sleeves. Shorts with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist. Overlocked edges around the sleeves and hems.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Skirt in layered tulle with a glitter print and covered elastication at the waist. Lined.
Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable hood and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets with a concealed press-stud, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, and three elastic straps with a fastening at the back.
Shorts in a sturdy cotton weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly. Fake back pockets with a flap, side pockets and flap leg pockets with a bellows pleat.
Warm-lined ankle boots with a zip at one side and loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Elastic hairband decorated with fabric flowers.
Leggings in stretch denim with elastication and a press-stud at the waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Wide tunic in a cool, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and short sleeves. Vertical seam down the front and back and soft draping.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a sheen. High, elasticated waist. Lined.
Jumper knitted in soft bouclé yarn containing some wool with terry appliqués on the front and long sleeves.

Dress in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, welt pockets in the side seams and short slits at the hem. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the dress is partly recycled.

Blouse in an airy, patterned chiffon weave with a decorative frill around the neckline, opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Partly lined in jersey.
Skirt in a soft, rib-knit viscose and wool blend with wide ribbing at the waist.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
H&M+ Long-sleeved, fitted top in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Lace-trimmed V-neck front and back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front and short slits in the sides.
Leggings in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist. Soft brushed inside.
Nursing top in soft, organic cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with functional fastening for easier nursing access, padded inserts and an elasticated hem.
Jumper in a cable-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in soft cotton terry with an elasticated drawstring waist, back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and smocked back. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

prod_name: Petite Jade HW Denim Trash TRS
detail_desc: High-waisted jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a text print. Hood with a wrapover front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and slits in the sides. Gently rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Blouse in airy, crinkled, patterned satin with a grandad collar and buttons down the front. Long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Lined, non-wired, triangle bikini top with a wide hem. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Jersey top with a slightly wider neckline and long dolman sleeves.
Sports trousers in fast-drying, functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a leg pocket with a taped zip. Tapered legs with wide ribbing at the hems.
Boys’ briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.
Brazilian briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Bomber jacket in patterned satin with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elasticated hem. Chiffon lining.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, and one button at the front. Flap front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
